context_cards.title: France, 1788: Crisis Before the Storm
context_cards.text: France is on the brink. Decades of royal spending and costly wars have emptied the treasury. Food prices soar, and hunger spreads among the poor. Yet at Versailles, luxury continues. The peopleâ€™s patience is thinning.

context_cards.title: May 1789: The Estates General Assemble
context_cards.text: In May 1789, Louis XVI summons the Estates-General (clergy, nobility, and commoners) to solve the crisis. But when the Third Estate demands real representation, tension rises. The old order begins to tremble.

context_cards.title: July 14th, 1789: The Storming of the Bastille
context_cards.text: Anger explodes in Paris. On July 14th, a mob storms the Bastille, symbol of royal tyranny. Gunfire, smoke, and chaos fill the streets. The Revolution has begun and there is no turning back.

dialogue.text: Citizens! The Senate teeters on the edge of conspiracy. Where do you stand?
dialogue.success_feedback: You caught the scent of conspiracy in the Senate.
dialogue.failure_feedback: Try mentioning the Senate or Caesar's looming fate.

dialogue.text: The ledgers never lie. What detail should I record about today's councils?
dialogue.success_feedback: The scribe nods and inks the detail immediately.
dialogue.failure_feedback: He hesitates. Be precise with the council's decisions.

dialogue.text: State your business. Who sent you to these halls?
dialogue.success_feedback: The guard allows you passage with a curt nod.
dialogue.failure_feedback: He grips his spear tighter. Mention your patron or mission.

dialogue.text: We craft tomorrow's decree tonight. What policy must we prioritise?
dialogue.success_feedback: He jots down your recommendation for the morning council.
dialogue.failure_feedback: He frowns. Aim for tangible policy or resources.

dialogue.text: Boats carry more than grain. What rumor should I ferry upriver?
dialogue.success_feedback: He salutes and orders the crew to spread the word.
dialogue.failure_feedback: He shrugs. Share something worth the voyage.

dialogue.text: Keep it quiet. Which cargo needs a silent escort tonight?
dialogue.success_feedback: He grins and signals his partners to prepare.
dialogue.failure_feedback: He backs away. Be specific about the contraband.
